metadata.Title: CVE-2021-29952 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: When Web Render components were destructed, a race condition could have caused undefined behavior, and we presume that with enough effort may have been exploitable to run arbitrary code. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 88.0.1 and Firefox for Android < 88.1.3.

notes.Note: tyhicks> mozjs contains a copy of the SpiderMonkey JavaScript engine

criterions.comment: firefox package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '88.0.1+build1-0ubuntu0.21.04.2').
mozjs78 package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
